title: Coca-Cola Company 's net operating revenues worldwide 2007 to 2019
summary: In general Revenues in billion U.S. dollars has fallen over the Year.
Revenues in billion U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2015.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Revenues in billion U.S. dollars, of value 46.85 was reached at Year 2013
